title: Wonder Work
author: Wonder Work
created_time: December 05, 2024, 02:56:39 AMLast edit: December 05, 2024, 03:10:32 AM by Wonder Work
content: Finally, after all the speculations, the price of Bitcoin has touched the milestone of $100k. Something new has been created for Bitcoin. We have been waiting for such a moment, which has come true. The expectation that the price of Bitcoin will go further shortly can undoubtedly be fulfilled. Our wait was over, and we reached a new milestone. From here, we will touch more new lines shortly. What are your feelings about the price of Bitcoin reaching $100k?

comments.author: Wiwo
comments.created_time: December 05, 2024, 03:34:42 AMLast edit: December 05, 2024, 03:58:54 AM by Wiwo
comments.body: Quote from: BADecker on December 05, 2024, 03:12:41 AM$104,000. ¬† ¬† ¬†$104,698.8 BTC this was the exact all time high price for bitcoin in the last 24 hour's, this is a big milestone achievement for bitcoin in this season, so congratulations to all of us in the industry, bitcoin finally break the $100k price benchmark the wait is now over.

comments.author: non fungible anxiety
comments.body: lol it finally broke 100k and went straight to 104, it's probably going to hit 110k this week.

comments.author: C10H15N
comments.body: Congratulations to all.This has been, and continues to be, the ride of a lifetime. ¬†üëçüèªüòÅ

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: Wonder Work on December 05, 2024, 02:56:39 AMWhat are your feelings about the price of Bitcoin reaching $100k?That this cycle is going to be very bullish, I will not be surprised to see a $0.5M or more cap in the cycle. The states haven't started buying yet, and neither have the majors, other than MSTR. When they do we are going to see legs of tens of thousands of dollars in a day.Quote from: non fungible anxiety on December 05, 2024, 03:35:50 AMlol it finally broke 100k and went straight to 104, it's probably going to hit 110k this week.It is only 5%. You can do that in a day. But despite the joy we shouldn't get too excited because it's not going to be a straight line up. There will be dips where minnows will get desperate and sell at a loss. Just keep HODLing.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: finally, those sellers at $100k got nothing to sell anymore ¬†Quote from: non fungible anxiety on December 05, 2024, 03:35:50 AMlol it finally broke 100k and went straight to 104, it's probably going to hit 110k this week.that's most likely the case, no big bitcoin sellers anymore seeing from the order book, I suppose we might even go straight $120k next week depend on the situation and if there's no bad news.anyway, congratulation to all BTC holders, especially the diamond hand ones .

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Unbelievable--though when bitcoin was hovering at $98k or so, I more or less figured the $100k mark would be surpassed fairly soon.¬† And yet now that it's in the six-figure range, I'm still blown away by it!I swear it was 2016-2018 when I said there would have to be a serious global financial crisis for the $50k mark to be reached (and I'd previously said the same thing about $1k, 10k, etc.), and I never would have predicted this valuation so soon and without something major having gone wrong in the world.¬† Crazy.

comments.author: Out of mind
comments.body: Bitcoin has achieved a great milestone today, I welcome everyone to Bitcoin $100k. This season, the Bitcoin milestone has increased surprisingly, which is really interesting. The price of Bitcoin has broken the milestone of $100k and stood at the highest ATH of $104088 today, which is what all Bitcoin investors are happy to see. New ATH1 BTC ¬†= $104088

comments.author: BitcoinBarrel
comments.body: Didn't think it would happen today, but it was going to happen sooner or later.Congrats to everyone that has stayed faithful to the one, true Crypto.

comments.author: tread93
comments.body: Quote from: Wiwo on December 05, 2024, 03:34:42 AMQuote from: BADecker on December 05, 2024, 03:12:41 AM$104,000. ¬† ¬† ¬†$104,698.8 BTC this was the exact all time high price for bitcoin in the last 24 hour's, this is a big milestone achievement for bitcoin in this season, so congratulations to all of us in the industry, bitcoin finally break the $100k price benchmark the wait is now over.What a great day for Bitcoin! Wow I can't believe this day has finally come I just checked my phone thinking I wasn't going to see anything and boom this sucker is up to 103k! We're going beyond the moon shooting in to the stars now!!! Next huge milestone 200k

comments.author: Jewan420
comments.body: It is truly incredible that Bitcoin has created a new ATH in just a few days in December, reaching $104k. This is really more than I expected. I had expected that Bitcoin might not be very bullish in December and it might be a bit difficult to reach six figures this month, but Bitcoin has managed to cross $100k and reach $104k in the beginning of December, which is much more than I expected.It is really fascinating to see my holding portfolio during such a pump. I have not been looking at Bitcoin charts for the last 2-3 days, suddenly today when I observed my portfolio, I was really surprised. Two things surprised me a lot, one is the price of Bitcoin and the second is the growth of the portfolio. Today I am doubly happy.Happy BTCitcoin $100k Day!

comments.author: Vadym IP
comments.body: Congrats, everyone! This day is already a part of history. And we all made it. To even more milestones together, we've made a looong way here. As some say: Work Hard, Party Later. Well, I think it's time to party.

comments.author: Hewlet
comments.body: Quote from: Out of mind on December 05, 2024, 04:00:54 AMBitcoin has achieved a great milestone today, I welcome everyone to Bitcoin $100k. This season, the Bitcoin milestone has increased surprisingly, which is really interesting. The price of Bitcoin has broken the milestone of $100k and stood at the highest ATH of $104088 today, which is what all Bitcoin investors are happy to see. New ATH1 BTC ¬†= $104088this is by far one of the most satisfying thing i have woken up to see in a long while.just like a joke and a bit of uncertainty on when we will even touch down on $100k, you are seeing $104K, its is indeed a milestone to be proud that i am a part of. after we got to $99k and then a sudden correction came, i had felt that it was going to take longer before we get back to $99k but here we are.bitcoin going up to the moon!

comments.author: Outhue
comments.body: It is bad if Bitcoin can't double its old all time high, as it has never happen before but thankfully Trump came to the rescue, this crypto market period has proven that with the right candidate for Bitcoin thing can be speed up better, I quit on thinking that the government and centralised authorities have no power over Bitcoin, they do, either hate or love it creates big awareness. People needed someone like Trump to take over, the market was in complete fear and after he won the confidence was back, are you seeing what I am seeing? If trump failed to win it is possible that this 100k will be slowed down, it will eventually happen but probably not this period of time.This is a big victory to all strong believers who held their Bitcoin all this time, congratulations.

comments.author: Richbased
comments.body: I know that threads about the price of bitcoin reaching $100k will be created in so many boards of the forum by different users but since we are in a happy mood that the price barrier of $100k has now been achieved, anyone can create thread about the excitement we are feeling right now. Just like magic, $100k was reached in less than 24 hours of consistent price pump. With this price movement of bitcoin, i can strongly believe that bitcoin can achieve any ATH at anytime now. I like the joy am feeling right now and i will want this joy not to end too soon if a massive correction do not happen because since a lot of investors has marked $100k as their selling target, no one knows what will happen after now but even if a price correction occurs, January will be another time to experience a great surge in the price. Let's keep the hope alive

comments.author: Popkon6
comments.body: Welcome to the price of Bitcoin touching $100k, but after a long time I was expecting this price of Bitcoin and it has been fulfilled. Because I am quite happy that the price of Bitcoin has touched more and more, which has touched the all-time high of $104k. The more Bitcoin increases in price, the more it will create new records, and I am more confident that Bitcoin will reach the milestone of $200k in the future. However, even if it is not possible in this current season, it is most likely to be possible in the next 2025, because the impact of the 2025 bull run will be long-lasting, so of course the price of Bitcoin will be at its highest point at that time. So now we are just waiting for investment. Those who retired from Binance must have regretted it, because the price of Bitcoin will definitely go up further.

comments.author: fikrett
comments.body: Quote from: Popkon6 on December 05, 2024, 06:57:32 AMWelcome to the price of Bitcoin touching $100k, but after a long time I was expecting this price of Bitcoin and it has been fulfilled. Because I am quite happy that the price of Bitcoin has touched more and more, which has touched the all-time high of $104k. The more Bitcoin increases in price, the more it will create new records, and I am more confident that Bitcoin will reach the milestone of $200k in the future. However, even if it is not possible in this current season, it is most likely to be possible in the next 2025, because the impact of the 2025 bull run will be long-lasting, so of course the price of Bitcoin will be at its highest point at that time. So now we are just waiting for investment. Those who retired from Binance must have regretted it, because the price of Bitcoin will definitely go up further.Truly wonderful - and yep, 200k is achievable, I would say 150-200-ish price is on the brink of our eyes during this cycle.Cheers to everybody!

comments.author: john_egbert
comments.body: Quote from: C10H15N on December 05, 2024, 03:38:47 AMCongratulations to all.This has been, and continues to be, the ride of a lifetime. ¬†üëçüèªüòÅThe ride that never stops.Hop on and enjoy the fireworks.

comments.author: FortuneFollower
comments.body: Quote from: The Sceptical Chymist on December 05, 2024, 03:49:19 AMUnbelievable--though when bitcoin was hovering at $98k or so, I more or less figured the $100k mark would be surpassed fairly soon.¬† And yet now that it's in the six-figure range, I'm still blown away by it!I swear it was 2016-2018 when I said there would have to be a serious global financial crisis for the $50k mark to be reached (and I'd previously said the same thing about $1k, 10k, etc.), and I never would have predicted this valuation so soon and without something major having gone wrong in the world.¬† Crazy.Let's hope it will stay that way.We don't need some crisis during the bull, geopolitical or economic.
